  • Method Details

    • getPurchaseView

      public PanelView getPurchaseView() throws UpdatingModelFailed
      Returns an updated, filtered PurchaseView that contains information of the purchases of the user signed in
      Returns:
      an updated filtered PurchaseView
      Throws:
      UpdatingModelFailed - if updating the PurchaseListModel model failed

    • getPurchsedItemsView

      public PanelView getPurchsedItemsView() throws UpdatingModelFailed, ChangingViewFailed
      Returns an updated, filtered PurchasedItemsView which contains information of the signed in user's purchased items
      Returns:
      an updated, filtered PurchasedItemsView
      Throws:
      UpdatingModelFailed - if the DetailedPurchaseTableModel failed to update
      ChangingViewFailed - if the categories for the filtering view failed to load

    • getAddPurchasesView

      public FrameView getAddPurchasesView()
      Returns an AddPurchaseView where the user can add and save a new purchase record
      Returns:
      an empty AddPurchaseView

    • getEditPurchaseView

      public FrameView getEditPurchaseView(Purchase purchase) throws NoItemWasSelected
      Returns an EditPurchaseView where the user can change, add or remove PurchasedItems in an existing purchase
      Parameters:
      purchase - the purchase that will be changed
      Returns:
      an EditPurchaseView filled with the existing items in it
      Throws:
      NoItemWasSelected - if no purchase was selected

    • getDetailedPurcahseView

      public FrameView getDetailedPurcahseView(Purchase purchase) throws NoItemWasSelected
      Returns a DetailedPurchaseView where the user can check details for the selected purchase

      The cells of the purchase can't be modified

      Parameters:
      purchase - the purchase that will be detailed
      Returns:
      a DetailedPurchaseView filled with the purchased items of the purchase
      Throws:
      NoItemWasSelected

    • refreshPurchaseView

      public void refreshPurchaseView() throws UpdatingModelFailed
      Refreshes the purchase view by creating a new instance and updating the main panel of mainFrame
      Throws:
      UpdatingModelFailed - if updating the PurchaseListModel model failed

    • refreshPurchasedItemsView

      public void refreshPurchasedItemsView() throws ChangingViewFailed, UpdatingModelFailed
      Refreshes the debt view by creating a new instance and updating the main panel of mainFrame
      Throws:
      UpdatingModelFailed - if the DetailedPurchaseTableModel failed to update
      ChangingViewFailed - if the categories for the filtering view failed to load

    • deleteRow

      public void deleteRow(PurchasedItemTableModel pitm, int rowIndex) throws DeleteUnfinishedEmptyRowException
      Deletes a row in the PurchasedItemTableModel

      The row can't be the last unfinished/empty row

      Parameters:
      pitm - the PurchasedItemTableModel where the row will be deleted
      rowIndex - the index of the row that will be deleted
      Throws:
      DeleteUnfinishedEmptyRowException - if the user tries to delete the lest row

    • addPurchase

      public void addPurchase(PurchasedItemTableModel pitm, LocalDate date) throws InvalidTableCellException, CreatingRecordFailed
      Adds and saves a purchase with the purchased items specified in the model and the date

      A Cashflow with the sumPayed amount will be also created

      Parameters:
      pitm - the PurchasedItemTableModel that stores the PurchasedItems of the purchase
      date - the date of the purchase
      Throws:
      InvalidTableCellException - if one of the cells has an invalid value.

      Cell can be invalid if:

      • the cell is blank
      • the cell stores a Money value and it's amount is 0 or less
      • the cell stores a double value and it's value is 0 or less
      CreatingRecordFailed -
      • if the model had no purchased items in it
      • if looking up the category of a PurchsedItem faield
      • if an IO Error occured

    • editPurchase

      public void editPurchase(Purchase purchase, PurchasedItemTableModel pitm, LocalDate dateOfPurchase) throws InvalidTableCellException, EditingRecordFailed
      Edits the an existing purchase based on the PurchasedItemTableModel and the dateOfPurchase

      Also edits the releveant cashflow record

      Parameters:
      purchase - the pruchase that will be changed
      pitm - PurchasedItemTableModel that stores the new PurchasedItems
      dateOfPurchase - the new date of the purchase
      Throws:
      InvalidTableCellException - if one of the cells has an invalid value.

      Cell can be invalid if:

      • the cell is blank
      • the cell stores a Money value and it's amount is 0 or less
      • the cell stores a double value and it's value is 0 or less
      EditingRecordFailed -
      • if the model had no purchased items in it
      • if looking up the category of a PurchsedItem faield
      • if an IO Error occured

    • deletePurchase

      public void deletePurchase(Purchase purchase) throws DeletingRecordFailed, NoItemWasSelected
      Removes a purchase from the save file
      Parameters:
      purchase - the purchase that will be removed
      Throws:
      DeletingRecordFailed - if an IO Error occured or the relevant cashlfow was not removed
      NoItemWasSelected - if no purchase was selected (purchase == null)

    • lookupCategories

      private void lookupCategories(List<PurchasedItem> purchasedItems) throws CategoryLookupFailedException, CreatingRecordFailed
      Finds and sets the Category of the PurchasedItems given in the parameter

      If a Category does not exist it will be created and assigned

      Parameters:
      purchasedItems - list of purchased items
      Throws:
      CategoryLookupFailedException - if the category was not found
      CreatingRecordFailed - if creating new category failed

    • getUsersPurchases

      private List<Purchase> getUsersPurchases() throws SerializerCannotRead
      Returns the purchses that belong to the user signed in
      Returns:
      the purchses that belong to the user signed in
      Throws:
      SerializerCannotRead - if an IO Error occured

    • checkCells

      private void checkCells(PurchasedItemTableModel pitm) throws InvalidTableCellException
      Validates the cells of a PurchasedItemTableModel

      Cell can be invalid if:

      • the cell is blank
      • the cell stores a Money value and it's amount is 0 or less
      • the cell stores a double value and it's value is 0 or less
      If a cell was invalid an exception will be thrown
      Parameters:
      pitm - the PurchasedItemTableModel
      Throws:
      InvalidTableCellException - if the cell is invalid

    • updatePurchaseModel

      private void updatePurchaseModel(long id) throws UpdatingModelFailed
      Updates the PurchaseListModel based on an id

      The model will conatin the purchase that's id matches with the parameter

      Parameters:
      id - id of the purchase
      Throws:
      UpdatingModelFailed - if an IO Error occured

    • updatePurchaseModel

      private void updatePurchaseModel() throws UpdatingModelFailed
      Updates the PurchaseListModel based on an id

      The model will contain every purchase that belongs to the user

      Throws:
      UpdatingModelFailed - if an IO Error occured

    • updatePurchasedItemModel

      private void updatePurchasedItemModel(LocalDate startDate, LocalDate endDate, Category category) throws UpdatingModelFailed
      Updates the DetailedPurchaseTableModel to match the filter options.

      The model will contain only those purchased items that were bought betweeen the start and the end date and has the same category as the parameter

      If the category parameter is set to null then modelsill not be filtered for any category

      Parameters:
      startDate - model will only have items that were purchased on the start date or after the start date
      endDate - model will only have items that were purchased on the start end or before the end date
      category - model will only have items that have the same category
      Throws:
      UpdatingModelFailed - if an IO Error occured

    • filterPurchasedItems

      public void filterPurchasedItems(LocalDate startDate, LocalDate endDate, String categoryString) throws FilteringFailed, UpdatingModelFailed
      Updates the filter varuables and the DetailedPurchaseTableModel model

      If category string is blank the model will not be fitlered for category

      Parameters:
      startDate -
      endDate -
      categoryString -
      startDate - model will only have items that were purchased on the start date or after the start date
      endDate - model will only have items that were purchased on the start end or before the end date
      categoryString - model will only have items that have category with the same name
      Throws:
      UpdatingModelFailed - if model was not updated due to an IO Error
      FilteringFailed - if start date is after end date or category was not found

    • filterPurchase

      public void filterPurchase(String idString) throws FilteringFailed, UpdatingModelFailed
      Updates the paremeters for PurchaseListModel and updates teh model
      Parameters:
      idString - a string representing a purchase id the user is looking for

      If id is blank the model will not fitler for any id

      Throws:
      FilteringFailed - if idString can't be parsed to a long value
      UpdatingModelFailed - if updating the model failed due to an IO Error

    • getAllPurchases

      public List<Purchase> getAllPurchases() throws SerializerCannotRead
      Throws:
      SerializerCannotRead
